@Mike_Douglas_ @MentalHealth_Hr @MHFAIreland @MHFAEngland I found it really useful for discussion around topics like suicide, self harm, psychosis and other terminology not used in day to day conversations. It enabled me to know what to do when speaking to someone who was feeling suicidal. Everyone should train in it! #mentalhealthhour

@MentalHealth_Hr I completed a 2 day course in "Mental Health First Aid" @MHFAIreland @MHFAEngland that I thought was extremely useful at helping me to have the conversations around suicide, self harm and supporting mental health. Highly recommend! #mentalhealthhour
